profile:
10 Matthews Avenue,Pembroke,ON,K8A 8A4,Canada


Ashley Homestore Select by Furniture King carries a huge selection of ​Ashley Furniture & Frigidaire appliances. Quality furniture & Home Appliances at affordable prices.  Ashley is the #1 Selling Furniture Brand and manufacturing company in the world!   
We are so excited to announce that Furniture King is converting into an Ashley Homestore Select!!! Amazing to think that we first started selling Ashley furniture at Custom Draperies but when the demand outgrew that store, we opened Furniture King in Petawawa.   We are going to be celebrating our 5th Anniversary in our brand new location at 10 Matthews Avenue in the West end of Pembroke this April thanks to the great support of our community! We carry Frigidaire appliances because of their outstanding quality and their patented, smudge-proof stainless steel, so you can say goodbye to annoying fingerprints! As well, we carry a large selection of quality Canadian mattresses & pillows at amazing prices! We offer many Low Interest finance options as well as exclusive offers for military Canex Financing.  Our Premier Delivery Service that includes full assembly and setup of your furniture in your home.  Our delivery crews take pride in their work!  We carry a large lineup of Home Décor items, including lamps, area rugs, pictures, vases, cushions, throws, and so much more to complement your new furniture! We are a one-stop shop for all your home’s needs.   
Knowledgeable and friendly staff members are eager to help you fall in love with your home all over again!
